name: baa
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the sound that a sheep or goat makes: "Baa," bleated the sheep. We listened to the therapeutic baas of sheep coming from the hills.
More examplesFewer examples"Baa," say the sheep.A child may hear the sheep puppet say "baa".Sheep go baa, ducks go quack.

(of a sheep or goat) to make a long sound: We could hear horses neighing and sheep baaing. The sheep all baaed in unison.
More examplesFewer examples I woke up at 5:00 a.m. to the sound of sheep baaing in the valley.Her vibrato has been compared to lambs baaing.Other possible verses are a cow that moos, a dog that barks, and sheep that baa.
